meanings.sent1: She misallocates her time by spending too much on unimportant tasks.
meanings.sent2: The company misallocates funds by investing in risky ventures.
meanings.sent3: The robot misallocates its energy, trying to clean the already spotless floor.
meanings.sent4: The gardener misallocates sunlight, planting shade-loving flowers in direct sun.
meanings.sent5: The teacher misallocates attention, focusing only on the noisy students.
